attributes.action: Uniform Tax Rebate for HM Forces
attributes.additional_details:
Anyone who wears a uniform at work and has to launder it themself can claim a tax rebate. Details can be found at www.uniformtaxrebate.co.uk.

The MOD and HMR&C have consulted on the issue and this allowance will NOT ordinarily be available to HM Forces personnel.

Sign this petition for the creation of a flat rate expense allowance to be available universally for HM Forces personnel for the laundry of uniform and maintenance of kit, such as is available to all other workers.
